The user requested to replace the logo image with that of a computer. The AI responded affirmatively, stating, "Got it, I will replace the logo image with a computer image." The user was then presented with two questions about their preferences regarding the new image: whether to maintain the original logo's dimensions or adjust them for aesthetic fit, and whether they would provide a specific computer image or prefer the AI to select a suitable stock image. The user indicated that they would provide a specific image and opted to adjust the dimensions for the best aesthetic fit.

Additionally, the user was offered a checklist of features for their project, noting that they wanted to implement a responsive logo design and add a matching favicon, which they confirmed. However, they chose not to enable dark/light mode adaptation, incorporate logo animation, or include an option to switch between logo versions. When further information was sought regarding size, resolution, and color scheme for the new image, the AI acknowledged, "Great, I'm on it! Replacing the logo with the new image," and prompted the user to describe the project in more detail.
